## RACI for Core Activities
| Activity | This Role |
|----------|-----------|
| [Activity 1] | [R/A/C/I] |
| [Activity 2] | [R/A/C/I] |
| [Activity 3] | [R/A/C/I] |
| [Activity 4] | [R/A/C/I] |

**Legend:**
- **R** = Responsible (does the work)
- **A** = Accountable (final authority/decision maker)
- **C** = Consulted (provides input)
- **I** = Informed (kept up to date)
